title: Bug 7945 - Search results not selected in external jar
description: Bug 7945Search results not selected in external jar Build 200201151. Search for references to this field5.
OB: When searching for references to a field, the search results are not being selected in cases where the field is located in an external jar.
EB: When searching for references to a field, the search results should be selected even if the field is located in an external jar. Specifically, in the method getTempDir(), you should get 3 matches.
SR:
1. Open the application using Build 200201151.
2. Search for references to the field.
3. Verify that the search results are selected.
4. In particular, check the method getTempDir() for 3 matches.
